content:
This video shows you how to leverage the DateDiff(), DateAdd(), Weekday(), DateValue(), and Day() functions to calculate any number of dates that are typical to business applications: first and last day of previous month, first and last day of previous quarter, first and last day of previous week, first and last day of current month, first and last day of current quarter, first and last day of current week, first and last day of next month, first and last day of next quarter, first and last day of next week, etc. Visit my blog to see all the calculations included.

Blog post: Power Apps: Calculating various dates with date functions
